DOING 
GOOD 
BUSINESS
“Increasing interdependencies in today’s business context 
encourage K&S to drive sustainability beyond operating 
silos. This year, for the first time, we have included supply 
chain management as a new material initiative. This allows 
us to extend our practice of good governance involving 
environmentally and socially-sound policies across our 
extended suppliers network to make a wider impact.”
- Shai Soloveizik,
Vice President of Global Operations and Supply Chain
